Detailed Description

A State Variable Filter object.

One of the features of a state variable filter is that it can provide all 4 filter types simultaneously from the same algorithm.

This implementation takes a different approach which requires the selection of one of the types. At some point in the future we could add a mode to get all 4 signals out of the output...

Member Function Documentation

TTErr TTSvf::clear (  )  [private]

This algorithm uses an IIR filter, meaning that it relies on feedback.

If the filter should not be producing any signal (such as turning audio off and then back on in a host) or if the feedback has become corrupted (such as might happen if a NaN is fed in) then it may be neccesary to clear the filter by calling this method.

Returns:
Returns a TTErr error code.
